text: Jaxon is a given name and surname. Notable people with the name include: ==Given name== * Jaxon Benge, American guitarist * Jaxon Crabb (born 1979), Australian rules footballer * Jaxon Lee (born 1968), American voice actor and video editor * Jaxon Shipley (born 1992), American football player ==Surname== * David Jaxon or David Jason (born 1950), English actor * Frankie Jaxon (c. 1896–1953), African-American vaudeville singer * Honoré Jaxon or Honoré Jackson (1861–1952), Canadian secretary to Louis Riel during the North-West Rebellion ==Fictional characters== * Jerry Jaxon, Marvel Comics * Peter Jaxon, Theo's younger brother in The Passage novel series * Theo Jaxon, Peter's older brother in The Passage novel series * Thunderbolt Jaxon, superhero comic-book character ==See also== * Eli Jaxon-Bear (born 1947), American-born spiritual teacher and author * Jaxson, given name * Jackson (name), given name and surname
title: Jaxon (name)
